text: within the shunting group it shall be possible for only one member of the group to transmit the link assurance signal at any time

the dpu dpa shall collect event mode data preserving the time and spatial resolution in the specified event window
if contact with the mobile radio network is lost then the cab radio shall give an audible and visual indication
a primary database will be used to store cached data for active user
the load acquirer must keep record by card number of all load that take place at it load device
it shall be possible for a user to override the automatic network selection manually this function shall not be available during call

the product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent request this number will increase to 2 000 by release 2 the concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling time such a early morning and late afternoon hour
each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner page
card capture where the card is pulled into the interior of a load device so that it may not be retrieved by the cardholder may be supported at the issuer s option and if the device is capable
system shall let customer register on the website a a pay a you go user in under 5 minute

for both the select by name first or only occurrence command and the select by name next occurrence command an application becomes the selected application on the basic logical channel if the requested aid match fully or partially the application aid the application being selected is in the correct life cycle state the application ha no restriction due to multi selection and support the current card interface

user access should be limited to the permission granted to their role s each level in the pcg hierarchy will be assigned a role and user will be assigned to these role access to functionality within rf system is dependent on the privilege permission assigned to the role
the terminal must secure transaction by retaining the card s symmetric macing key signature a part of the transaction
perform the calculation required to generate a signature using the psam s private rsa key to allow the cep card to validate the psam

the card issuer generates s2 which is sent to the card to allow the card to validate the card issuer s authenticity and to ensure that the data used by the card in the transaction is the same a the card issuer intended
if a select by name first or only occurrence is received the search always begin from the start of the globalplatform registry
